name: hi_score
description: Are you ready to get off the framework-of-the-month treadmill and take control of your SPA? Hi_Score is here to help with an architecture guide, starter files, and best-in-class libraries.

scripts.coveralls: node_modules/.bin/jscoverage js && DO_COV=1 node_modules/.bin/nodeunit --reporter=lcov test/nu_xhi.util.js | node_modules/.bin/coveralls
scripts.coverage: node_modules/.bin/jscoverage js && DO_COV=1 node_modules/.bin/nodeunit --reporter=lcov test/nu_xhi.util.js > coverage/out.da; genhtml coverage/out.da -o coverage

author: Michael S. Mikowski <mike.mikowski@gmail.com>
